== Thuneri (CT) (627355) ==

Thuneri (CT) is a town in the [[Vadakara]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 15.45 sq. km. and harbouring 5212 households with total population of 23421 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 45 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 445 km. Male population is 10693 and female population is 12728. Scheduled Caste population is 352 and Scheduled Tribes population is 31. Census Location Code of the town is 627355<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 45 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 45 km. Railway station is at Vadakara at a distance of 20 km.
